text: How to share an array in Python with a C++ Program?
I two programs running, one in Python and one in C++, and I need to share a two-dimensional array (just of decimal numbers) between them.
I am currently looking into serialization, but pickle is python-specific, unfortunately.
What is the best way to do this?
Edit: It is likely that the array will only have 50 elements or so, but the transfer of data will need to occur very frequently: 60x per second or more.
